4.21.22  9:20 am   So here's the deal, I wanna make a movie over the summer. I got this idea like a month ago, but due to ADD, I tend to get worked up over an idea and then drop it, but not this time, it's stayed in my head for a while, so I think it gonna happen. It's not gonna be a great movie, of course, because A) my friends and I that wanna so it are 14-16 yrs old, plus my sister, who is 12, B) I'd have to borrow camera equipment, and still have to find someone who can edit, and C) we don't have much money to spend on props or a set or anything. luckily I think we can work through these, but here's my question: do you have any advice for... any of this?

     you make cool videos a lot, and IDK, I thought maybe you might. Also it would be nice if you could wish us luck lol
4.21.22  8:48 am   i need to replace the word "engineer" with another word, what word do you recommend?

4.21.22  8:46 am   Bill, I'm overly conscious right now that all emotions are chemicals in my brain, and my whole personality has/is being formed based on the person that I am through no decision of my own.

      I've dealt with these thoughts before, but they're really scary and they feel like they will never go away and I will always feel like this. I know I won't, but what can I do to pass the time while I wait?

4.21.22  1:10 am   Is there any good way you would notate Bsus2,4/A other than that?

     The context is starting on a Bsus2,4 feeling like 1min and moving the bass note down a whole step. It really feels like there should be another way to notate, because it's really a b7 chord with added 2 and 6, and purposefully no 4 and 7. So Aadd2,6? Or F#7sus/A?
